rows.label: tlk006701_05_msg0001
rows.name:
There was an explosion over by the World Tree!
Were you all okay?

rows.label: tlk006701_05_msg0002
rows.name:
I've never been so glad to be
stationed here at the Torigo base...

rows.label: tlk006701_05_msg0003
rows.name:
I know the homeland is in an unprecedented crisis,
but a mere soldier like me can't do anything to help...

rows.label: tlk006701_05_msg0004
rows.name:
The least I can do is properly look after the people
who have evacuated to the Torigo base...

rows.label: tlk006701_05_msg0005
rows.name:
Meleph-sama!?
Why are you in a place like this?

rows.label: tlk006701_05_msg0006
rows.name:
Could it be that you were worried about us stationed in Gula!?
What an honor!

rows.label: tlk006701_05_msg0007
rows.name:
If someone like Meleph-sama were my direct superior,
I'm sure my work would be so much more rewarding...
